item.description:
Allan Hughes, DC will be leading this engaging program. He says, "Each of us has a quiet voice inside us that whispers to us in silence. Some say itâ€™s the voice of our soul calling to us. We can ignore it and go about our business or we can listen. What is it trying to tell us, and how can we tune into it so we can hear it more clearly?"
Allan will also be explaining the technique of Jyoti meditation (meditation on the inner Light) and the program includes a meditation period.

group.name: The Science of Spirituality Meditation Meetup

item.name: The Heart's Cry
